Title: Preowned Quartz 12 Hr Number 8 Collector Pocket Watch W/Chain/Clip
Description: A Preowned, Excellent, Pocket Watch With Gold Tone "8" Surrounded By Transparent Red Acrylic Insert Surrounded By Gold Tone Metal, Front Cover And Gold Tone Bezel And Back Cover. Long Chain Plus Belt and Watch Clip, Also has Faux Leather Covered Plastic Display Box That Holds Open Until You Start To Close it, Then About Halfway Down It Snaps Shut. New 377 Battery Installed, Waiting For You To Turn It On. Item specifics are: Finish: Polished.Diameter: 1-7/8".Origin: Crafted in China and if used properly, should last a lifetime and it's tough enough to git'er done.. Condition: Preowned, Excellent, in nice faux leather over felt lined padded plastic box.This is great carry watch, an asset to any collection or a fine gift idea that will be used for years and you will be remembered every time it is opened or looked at and one size fits all. Please read entire listing and view all photos as they are part of the description. FAST, FREE, SHIPPING to U.S.A. and it's Protectorates. This item ships same or next business day.
